comment.shortText: Sets the CDN live audio/video transcoding settings.

shortText: Width of the video. The default value is 360.
The minimum value of width × height is 16 × 16.
Height of the video. The default value is 640.
The minimum value of width × height is 16 × 16.

text: Set this parameter according to the Video Bitrate Table.
If you set a bitrate beyond the proper range, the SDK automatically
adapts it to a value within the range.
shortText: Bitrate of the CDN live output video stream.

comment.text: **Note**: Agora adjusts all values over 30 to 30.
shortText: Frame rate of the output video stream set for the CDN live broadcast.
- true: Low latency with unassured quality.
- false: (Default) High latency with assured quality.

comment.shortText: Video GOP in frames. The default value is 30 fps.

shortText: Generally used in video calls on mobile phones.
Generally used in mainstream electronics, such as MP4 players, portable
Generally used in high-resolution broadcasts or television.

text: The background color in RGB hex value. Value only, do not include a #.
For example, 0xFFB6C1 (light pink). The default value is 0x000000 (black).

comment.shortText: The number of users in the live broadcast.

text: A special player is required if you choose option 3, 4, or 5:

comment.shortText: Bitrate of the CDN live audio output stream. The default value is 48 Kbps, and the highest value is 128.

comment.text: For more information on SEI frame, see [SEI-related questions](https://docs.agora.io/cn/Agora%20Platform/live_related_faq?platform=%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%E7%9B%B8%E5%85%B3#sei).
comment.shortText: Reserved property. Extra user-defined information to send SEI for the H.264/H.265 video stream to the CDN live client. Maximum length: 4096 Bytes.
The watermark image added to the CDN live publishing stream.
